entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
